content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/explosion/spaCy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python base image
FROM python:3.8

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository to the working directory
COPY . /app/

# Install system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y build-essential python3-dev git && \
    apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Create a virtual environment and activate it
RUN python -m venv .env && \
    . .env/bin/activate && \
    # Upgrade pip and install the requirements
    python -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel && \
    pip install -r requirements.txt

# Compile spaCy from source
RUN . .env/bin/activate && \
    python setup.py build_ext --inplace

# Run the test suite
RUN . .env/bin/activate && \
    pytest
